name: Wobbly Scraps
description:
The monster in front of you has: pikes, tentacles, horns and 3 times your size.

You have: nothing.

But you still can survive! Run, Avoid his deadly charges, collect junk and build a wobbly war machine to beat the hell up this bastard!

  1. W,A,S,D : Move
  2. Left Click : pick up/place/throw/dash
  3. Right Click : build
  4. Space : Mount/Dismount

Build a vehicle body by Right-Clicking next to a scrap (or 2 scraps combined to do a bigger vehicle). Add to it some guns, and stuff that you find on the ground and chase the monster! You can repair your vehicle with scraps.

Game made for the Ludum Dare 45 : Start With Nothing

by NicoChampinox : Music, Léoking : Game Design and  Caberu : Arts, Game Desisgn & Programing
